data.message: Marriage has nothing to do with equality! There's a reason 2 men or 2 women cant create!!!

replies.message: Neither can infertile people should they not get married.
I hope you're not creating with those prehistoric thoughts.
There sure are a lot of children, up for adoption, that could use a nice home with loving parents regardless of sexual orientation...
Yeah..but Kardashian and spears have shown us how sanctified marriage is. Right?
Racism & homophobia isn't the same. Homosexuality isn't a race.
Turn your back on God at your own peril.
I can't turn my back on something that doesn't exist.

If marriage is only about pro creation then straight couples who can't have kids can't get married either. That includes the elderly, men who get vasectomy's, women who have hysterectomy's, men and women who were born sterile, and men and women who had some accident that made them sterile. That is what is what you are saying.
I totally agree with you, Jessica.  I'm just sorry that you weren't able to spell better and present yourself more clearly.  It does tend to denigrate your message.
Dyslexia and typing while feeding a baby tend to make it hard to spell things correctly and get  things across correctly. But thank you for figuring out what I was trying to say.
